Reporting Approach World Class Governance Corporate Citizenship Care for Our Environment Overview Our Response to Covid- 19
ICU 4 U Charity CycleLocal Community Covid-19 Initiatives
17We supported various charitable projects in 2020 that were focused on the Covid- 19 relief effort
© 2021 AerCap  |Confidential property of the company, not for disclosure or use without permissionAerCap was the lead sponsor of the “ICU 4 U” Charity 
Cycle, a two-day event in which intensive care unit (“ICU”) doctors, nurses and staff cycled across Ireland to raise €100,000 for four charities which have been particularly affected by the Covid-19 crisis
The ICU teams finished the cycle at the Mater Hospital in Dublin where An Taoiseach, Micheál Martin TD, met 
the teams
As part of our Covid-19 outreach, we donated $5,000 to Frontline & Adolescent Mental Health Research to the benefit of charity, SpunOut.ie
